definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to extend New Year's greetings/to pay a New Year's visit
He Long (1896-1969), important communist military leader, died from persecution during the Cultural Revolution
Helan Mountains, lying across part of the border between Ningxia and Inner Mongolia
to congratulate respectfully/to express good wishes

sentences.english: How should I great, with silence and tears.
sentences.chinese: 我如何贺你，以沉默一眼泪。

sentences.english: Hernandez and Abbott. What about the rest?
sentences.chinese: 贺南德兹和阿巴，其他人呢？

sentences.english: Are Marks and Hernandez gonna give us trouble?
sentences.chinese: 马克和贺南德兹还想找麻烦？

sentences.english: By Sunday morning, I was so angry with Dr.
sentences.chinese: 但是周日清晨，我对贺博士大闹肝火，我想离开。

sentences.english: Fellowship leaders, please contact Lao Ho to update information of your fellowship.
sentences.chinese: 若资料需要更改，请团契负责人与贺陈隽联络。

sentences.english: Both card and envelope can be overprinted.
My name’s Jenny. I’m from Chengdu Sanyuan Foreign Languages School.
sentences.chinese: 我是来自成都市三原外国语学校的贺珍妮。

sentences.english: If I should see you, after long years, How should I greet?
sentences.chinese: 如果我会见到你，事隔多年。我如何贺你？

sentences.english: Dr. He has 8 years of working experience in both China and overseas.
sentences.chinese: 贺博士有8年的国内和国外工作经验。

sentences.english: Overture of Spring Festival is a very famous piece of Chinese instrumental m…
sentences.chinese: 春节序曲是李唤之作曲的著名贺新春乐曲。

sentences.english: Dick Hoyt and his son, Rick, prove anything is possible.
sentences.chinese: 迪克贺伊特和儿子瑞克证明了一切皆有可能。

sentences.english: How is Mr. Holmes getting along in his new job?
sentences.chinese: 贺尔姆斯先生的新工作做得怎样？

sentences.english: How is Mr. Holmes getting August in his new job?
sentences.chinese: 贺尔姆斯男士的新任务做得怎么？

sentences.english: Key techniques for propagation and cross breeding of He 50A was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了贺50A的繁殖制种技术要点。

sentences.english: Incredibly, one man stood to the side, smoking a cigarette, Härstedt remembers.
sentences.chinese: 神奇的是一个男人竟站在一边抽著烟，贺斯特回忆。

sentences.english: Hangzhou Prefecture Yao love the poem, to crown towel, renamed Ho.
sentences.chinese: 杭州太守姚合爱其诗，加以冠巾，改名贺。
